targets.query:
from(bucket: "vechain")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "individual_validators")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["staker"] == "${staker}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "start_block")
  |> group()
  |> last()

from(bucket: "vechain")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "individual_validators")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["staker"] == "${staker}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "start_block")
  |> first()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _value: r.status }))

from(bucket: "vechain")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "individual_validators")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["staker"] == "${staker}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "online_changed" or r["_field"] == "status_changed" or r["_field"] == "weight_changed" or r["_field"] == "stake_changed" or r["_field"] == "exit_block_changed")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: string(v: r._value) }))
  |> group()
  |> keep(columns: ["_field", "_time", "status"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: true)

from(bucket: "vechain")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "individual_validators")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["staker"] == "${staker}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "exit_block")
  |> group()
  |> last()

from(bucket: "vechain")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "hayabusa_gas" and r["signer"] == "${staker}" and r["_field"] == "validators_share")
  |> sum()

from(bucket: "vechain")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "hayabusa_gas" and r["signer"] == "${staker}" and r["_field"] == "validators_share")
  |> sum()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: float(v: r._value) * float(v: "${vtho_price}")}))

from(bucket: "vechain")
  |> range(start: -20y)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "validator_overview" and r["signer"] == "${staker}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "signer_probability" or r["_field"] == "block_number" or  r["_field"] == "epoch" or r["_field"] == "block_in_epoch")
  |> pivot(
      rowKey:["_time"],
      columnKey: ["_field"],
      valueColumn: "_value"
  )
  |> sort(columns: ["block_number"], desc: true)
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "chain_tag", "signer"])

panels.title: Recent Blocks (TODO: Why is block probability different for same epoch?)

targets.query:
latestRecord = from(bucket: "vechain")
  |> range(start: 2015-01-01T00:00:00Z, stop: 2100-01-01T00:00:00Z)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "individual_validators")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "staked_amount")
  |> group()
  |> last()
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

latestTime = latestRecord._time

from(bucket: "vechain")
  |> range(start: latestTime)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "individual_validators")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["staker"] == "${staker}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "staked_amount" or r["_field"] == "delegators_staked")
  |> pivot(
        rowKey:["_time", "staker"],
        columnKey: ["_field"],
        valueColumn: "_value"
    )
  |> group()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r.delegators_staked + r.staked_amount }))
  |> last()
  |> drop(columns: ["delegators_staked", "staked_amount"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _value: float(v: r._value) * float(v: "${vet_price}")}))

latestRecord = from(bucket: "vechain")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "staked_amount")
  |> group()

  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r.delegators_staked + r.staked_amount }))
  |> last()
  |> drop(columns: ["delegators_staked", "staked_amount"])

  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "individual_validators")

  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "individual_validators" and r["staker"] == "${staker}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "staked_amount")
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "_time"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "vechain")
  |> range(start: -20y)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "validation_queued" or r["_measurement"] == "validation_withdrawn" or r["_measurement"] == "validation_signaled_exit" or r["_measurement"] == "stake_increased" or r["_measurement"] == "stake_decreased")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["validator"] == "${staker}")
  |> group()
  |> drop(columns: ["_stop", "_start"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: true)

staker="0xf514f19cd174de4f33874256c0748a98a031d73a"
vet_price="0.02"

latestRecord = from(bucket: "vechain")
  |> range(start: 2015-01-01T00:00:00Z, stop: 2100-01-01T00:00:00Z)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "individual_validators")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "staked_amount")
  |> group()
  |> last()
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

latestTime = latestRecord._time

complete_periods = from(bucket: "vechain")
  |> range(start: latestTime)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "individual_validators")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["staker"] == "${staker}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "completed_periods")
  |> group()
  |> last()
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

current = complete_periods._value + uint(v: 1)

from(bucket: "vechain")
  |> range(start: -5y)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "delegation_added")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["validator"] == "${staker}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "stake" or r["_field"] == "weight" or r["_field"] == "multiplier" or r["_field"] == "start_period")
  |> pivot(
        rowKey:["_time", "delegation_id"],
        columnKey: ["_field"],
        valueColumn: "_value"
    )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["start_period"] <= current)
   |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with 
    "Delegation ID": r.delegation_id,
    "VET": r.stake,
    "Multiplier": r.multiplier,
    "Weight": r.weight,
    "Stake USD": float(v: r.stake) * float(v: "${vet_price}")
    }))
  |> keep(columns: ["VET", "Delegation ID", "Multiplier", "Weight", "_time", "Stake USD"])
  |> sort(columns: ["Stake USD"], desc: true)

targets.query:
latestRecord = from(bucket: "vechain")
  |> range(start: 2015-01-01T00:00:00Z, stop: 2100-01-01T00:00:00Z)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "individual_validators")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "staked_amount")
  |> group()
  |> last()
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

latestTime = latestRecord._time

complete_periods = from(bucket: "vechain")
  |> range(start: latestTime)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "individual_validators")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["staker"] == "${staker}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "completed_periods")
  |> group()
  |> last()
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

current = complete_periods._value + uint(v: 1)

from(bucket: "vechain")
  |> range(start: -5y)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "delegation_added")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["validator"] == "${staker}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "stake" or r["_field"] == "weight" or r["_field"] == "multiplier" or r["_field"] == "start_period")
  |> pivot(
        rowKey:["_time", "delegation_id"],
        columnKey: ["_field"],
        valueColumn: "_value"
    )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["start_period"] > current)
   |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with 
    "Delegation ID": r.delegation_id,
    "VET": r.stake,
    "Multiplier": r.multiplier,
    "Weight": r.weight,
    "Stake USD": float(v: r.stake) * float(v: "${vet_price}")
    }))
  |> keep(columns: ["VET", "Delegation ID", "Multiplier", "Weight", "_time", "Stake USD"])
  |> sort(columns: ["Stake USD"], desc: true)

panels.title: Queued Delegations (TODO: Filter out positions that withdraw before getting locked)

targets.query:
latestRecord = from(bucket: "vechain")
  |> range(start: 2015-01-01T00:00:00Z, stop: 2100-01-01T00:00:00Z)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "individual_validators")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "staked_amount")
  |> group()
  |> last()
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

latestTime = latestRecord._time

complete_periods = from(bucket: "vechain")
  |> range(start: latestTime)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "individual_validators")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["staker"] == "${staker}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "completed_periods")
  |> group()
  |> last()
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

current = complete_periods._value + uint(v: 1)

from(bucket: "vechain")
  |> range(start: -5y)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "delegation_signaled_exit")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["validator"] == "${staker}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
    r["_field"] == "block" or 
    r["_field"] == "exit_period" or 
    r["_field"] == "multiplier" or 
    r["_field"] == "validator_staking_period" or 
    r["_field"] == "validator_start_block" or 
    r["_field"] == "weight" or
    r["_field"] == "exit_block" or
    r["_field"] == "stake"
  )
  |> pivot(
        rowKey:["_time", "delegation_id"],
        columnKey: ["_field"],
        valueColumn: "_value"
    )
  |> group()

panels.title: Signalled Exit Delegations (TODO: Separate this by exited or exiting, based on current block and exit block)
